Hi Janina

Try going to settings > account > fetching mail > incoming server

Click next through the screens and see if authentication completes successfully. If authentication fails, check the user name and password are correct.

Repeat for steps on the sending mail > outgoing server page.

You could also login to your email providers web portal to test there's no issue with your password or account.

Ticking Unify on the sent and trash folder will display their content within the Unified Inbox folder. I will not display a separate Unified Sent and Unified trash folder underneath Unified Inbox. The developers are planning to add this feature in the future but it's not implemented yet.

See the below link: https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/issues/9370
